tool.name: qiime2 feature-classifier classify-consensus-blast

param.name: blastdb
param.label: blastdb: BLASTDB
param.help: [optional] BLAST indexed database. Incompatible with reference_reads.

param.name: maxaccepts
param.label: maxaccepts: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 10] Maximum number of hits to keep for each query. BLAST will choose the first N hits in the reference database that exceed perc_identity similarity to query. NOTE: the database is not sorted by similarity to query, so these are the first N hits that pass the threshold, not necessarily the top N hits.

param.name: perc_identity
param.label: perc_identity: Float % Range(0.0, 1.0, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0.8] Reject match if percent identity to query is lower.

param.name: query_cov
param.label: query_cov: Float % Range(0.0, 1.0, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0.8] Reject match if query alignment coverage per high-scoring pair is lower. Note: this uses blastn's qcov_hsp_perc parameter, and may not behave identically to the query_cov parameter used by classify-consensus-vsearch.

param.name: evalue
param.label: evalue: Float
param.help: [default: 0.001] BLAST expectation value (E) threshold for saving hits.

param.name: output_no_hits
param.label: output_no_hits: Bool
param.help: [default: Yes] Report both matching and non-matching queries. WARNING: always use the default setting for this option unless if you know what you are doing! If you set this option to False, your sequences and feature table will need to be filtered to exclude unclassified sequences, otherwise you may run into errors downstream from missing feature IDs. Set to FALSE to mirror default BLAST search.

param.name: min_consensus
param.label: min_consensus: Float % Range(0.5, 1.0, inclusive_start=False, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0.51] Minimum fraction of assignments must match top hit to be accepted as consensus assignment.

param.name: unassignable_label
param.label: unassignable_label: Str
param.help: [default: 'Unassigned'] Annotation given to sequences without any hits.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: feature-classifier classify-consensus-blast ==================================================== BLAST+ consensus taxonomy classifier
Outputs: -------- :classification.qza: Taxonomy classifications of query sequences. :search_results.qza: Top hits for each query.
|
Description: ------------ Assign taxonomy to query sequences using BLAST+. Performs BLAST+ local alignment between query and reference_reads, then assigns consensus taxonomy to each query sequence from among maxaccepts hits, min_consensus of which share that taxonomic assignment. Note that maxaccepts selects the first N hits with > perc_identity similarity to query, not the top N matches. For top N hits, use classify-consensus-vsearch.
|
